Title: PaperBoy - WPF rss reader
Description:
PaperBoy is a free rss reader written using Windows Presentation Foundation and .NET 3.5 SP1.
PaperBoy has new interesting features like themes/skin, an innovative HTML visualization, client syncronization and it uses IE 7.0 feed API as repository, so you can subscribe to feeds using your browser.
HomeWiki:
PaperBoy is a free rss reader written using Windows Presentation Foundation and .NET 3.5 SP1.
PaperBoy has new interesting features like themes/skin, an innovative HTML visualization, client syncronization and it uses IE 7.0 feed API as repository, so you can subscribe to feeds using your browser.

by Cristian Civera AKA Ricciolo

Features

  • uses .NET Framework 3.5 SP1 and Windows Presentation Foundation tecnology
  • new items view mode based on WPF flow documents
  • integrated with Internet Explorer 7.0 feeds API
  • tree visualization for comments
  • themes/skin support (coming soon)
  • online syncronization with other PaperBoy clients (coming soon)

FAQ
